value: In the excavations carried out in 2007 and 2011, three aristocratic graves were documented, corresponding to tombs 127a, 127b, and 128, a girl and two adult women. We know that all three died synchronously and were the subject of joint rituals, with cremation at the foot of the tomb (bustum), and the development of funeral banquets.
In the necropolis of Las Ruedas, find a weapon in a tomb. What status of the deceased do you think it belonged to?
